price: Eles não estimam a Allah como se deve estimar a Ele. Por certo, Allah é Forte, Todo-Poderoso.
arabic: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: mā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
